item.title: Is 8GB Macbook M1 enough for development
item.description:
The answer is no!

Here I have few apps open like: Chrome, Docker, vscode, Teams, Outlook web app, Spotify, Whatsapp, Notes, maybe some more, but nothing very specific that would hog the memory.

So if you buy one, I suggest to get Macbook pro with 16GB memory and I suggest you do, because its pretty awesome.
item.dc:creator: Gints Murāns

item.title: Serveris
item.description: Beidzot pieķēros pie nesaprot.net un paarinstalēju serveri! Kaut kas neiet vēl ar wp administrāciju, bet gan sataisīšu! ok, arlabunakti!
item.dc:creator: Gints Murāns
